TEXT: The Duelist summons and tributes monster cards to slay the spire. Play your favorite deckbuilding game with a Yu-Gi-Oh! twist.
You touch the heart. Is this the heart of the cards?

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. ~"Join~ ~us~ ~dueling~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
